  • https://minutestomidnight.co.uk/blog/de-brand/

    I love this essay, Simone. Fully embracing the very IndieWeb concept of a personal website has helped me shake this feeling of FOMO, I imagine the same way it did for you. Don‚Äôt be hard on yourself, though, we all fell for this concept, and many of us still do. If society presents something as a way to solve a problem, most people will eventually try it. And while it does solve some problems, it also creates others. I have a few Gen Z friends who never fail to make me feel old whenever they talk about ‚Äútheir personal brand‚Äù in an unironic way. Gives me the shivers.
